Portfolio.title: Portfelis
Portfolio.description: My personal portfolio website consisting of my projects, skill stack and contact information. This is what you visit right now.

Splendid.title: Splendid
Splendid.description: Hibrīda CMS palašinošs ietvars darbināts no tā milzāgās koda bāzes. Dod pilnīgi jaunu skatu uz CMS.

Todo tracker.title: Plānotājs
Todo tracker.description: Minimālistisks plānotājs veidots izmantojot Vue.js un Tailwind CSS. Izmanto produktu "Firebase" priekš authentifikācijas un datubāzēm.

Profile Card.title: Profila Kartīte
Profile Card.description: Vienkārša profila kartīte veidota vadoties pēc programmas "Discord" profila kartītes. Mans pirmais projekts mājaslapu veidošanā.

Slova.title: Slova
Slova.description: A placeholder tool for generating non-existing speakable words. Great tool if you want to look at your product from a different angle.

KNRTU-KAI Discord Bot.title: KNRTU-KAI Discord Bot
KNRTU-KAI Discord Bot.description: A Discord bot for KNRTU-KAI university. It provides a lot of useful features for students and teachers.

Kai.js.title: Kai.js
Kai.js.description: A small modern API wrapper of the KNRTU-KAI website written for Node.js. It is used in the KNRTU-KAI Discord Bot.

Cvet.title: Cvet
Cvet.description: An effecient color tool for customizing and picking colors for projects without any hesitation.

Ikota.title: Ikota
Ikota.description: A CLI boilerplate automation tool offering various utilities to help working with React web applications.

Krasota.title: Krasota
Krasota.description: Responsive, strongly typed, open source light React UI library. Amazing solution for extending your UI.
